title: World FC (Belize)
text:
World FC is a <a href="Belize">Belize</a>an <a href="Association%20football">football</a> team which currently competes in the <a href="Premier%20League%20of%20Belize">Premier League of Belize</a>.
The team is based in <a href="San%20Ignacio%2C%20Belize">San Ignacio</a>. Their home stadium is <a href="Norman%20Broaster%20Stadium">Norman Broaster Stadium</a>.
